name: Galactic n' Guns
description:
A game made from scratch using Python and PyGame...

It's a game about trying to survive as long as possible in space while fighting enemy space ships and dodging/shooting meteorites. The game has two modes, normal mode and insane mode. If you ever feel like the scaling is too slow and the beginning is too easy, you can always try insane mode for a more challenging start in a run.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD - To move
  • Space or Any Mouse Button - To shoot
  • E - To mute/unmute the background music
  • Q - To mute/unmute all audio sources

Background music from: Juhani Junkala

Shield up audio from: MATRIXX
